subject: feat: complete UI/UX backlog — lazy rendering, Tailwind v4, accessibility
body:

- Add "Load more" button to changes list (no more hard 100 cap)

- Migrate from CDN Tailwind to build-time Tailwind v4 (@tailwindcss/vite)
- Keyboard-navigable filter dropdowns (Enter/Space/arrows/Escape)
- Text labels on all urgency/impact stacked bars for accessibility
